about.title: Burned Games
about.subtitle: We are a team of 39 students from the Polytechnic University of Catalonia (UPC) at the CITM center. This project is our final course work, developed collaboratively by the entire class using our own game engine. Through months of dedication and teamwork, dividing ourselves into production, design, art, and programming departments, we were able to create Warhammer 40,000: The Last Marine in 5 months.

downloads.title: Downloads
downloads.subtitle: Download our game for your platform

game.title: A new Warhammer 40.000 Title
game.subtitle: By Burned Games

catchphrase.line1: Only one Ultramarine survived the drop - Battle-Brother Quintus Maxillian.

game.mainDescription: You are the last Space Marine. Unleash your strength and courage on the battlefield to eliminate any enemy that stands in your way. Will you be able to reach the end of this story using your entire arsenal?

worldExploration.title: World Exploration
worldExploration.description: Explore a world full of challenges, enemies, and rewards. From the most desolate desert to the darkness of the Hive City, will you be able to survive as the last Space Marine?

diabloLike.title: Diablo-Like
diabloLike.description: Our game features incredible world exploration combined with the fun and intense gameplay of Diablo, delivering a unique and unmatched experience.

fastPaced.title: Fast-Paced
fastPaced.description: Thanks to the fast-paced gameplay, combat will be filled with frantic action that will put every player's skills to the test.

ownEngine.title: Own Game Engine
ownEngine.description: This game is developed exclusively on our own game engine, which allows us great customization and optimization of the experience.

lore.heading: Our Universe
lore.paragraph1: The hive world of Temperis is under siege. A brutal WAAAGH! led by the savage ork warboss Brutus has plunged the planet into chaos. The hive city of Martyria Eterna, the last bastion of resistance, is being overrun by endless green-skinned hordes.
lore.paragraph2: In response, a strike force from the Ultramarines 3rd Company is deployed via orbital drop assault. But the overwhelming numbers of the orks and a storm of anti-aircraft fire turn the skies into a deathtrap. Drop pods are blasted from the heavens, one by one destroyed mid-air or crushed upon landing by the xenos tide.

character.title: Ultramarine
character.description: An elite Space Marine of the Imperium. Wielding heavy armor, brute strength, and lethal training, he's the last line of defense against the Ork horde. Specialized in ranged combat with melee support.

weapons.title: Weapons
weapons.description: Wield devastating plasma weapons, chainswords, and ancient relics. Each weapon can be upgraded and customized for your playstyle.

chainsword.name: Chainsword
chainsword.description: Melee weapon. Area damage, heals the player based on number of enemies hit.

shotgun.name: Assault Shotgun
shotgun.description: Short-range. Heavy spread, devastating in close combat.

bolter.name: Bolter Rifle
bolter.description: Mid-range, versatile. Fires self-propelled explosive rounds.

abilities.title: Abilities
abilities.description: Master devastating combat abilities and tactical maneuvers to turn the tide of battle.

dash.name: Dash
dash.description: Short-range, fast displacement with temporal invincibility.

rifleSpecial.name: Rifle Special Ability
rifleSpecial.description: Launches a big electric bullet that explodes on-hit.

shotgunSpecial.name: Shotgun Special Ability
shotgunSpecial.description: Launches an explosive grenade that displaces enemies.

armorSpecial.name: Armor Special Ability
armorSpecial.description: A banner descends from the sky and lands near the player, emitting a powerful aura that buffs the Ultramarine for a limited time.

enemies.heading: Face the Darkness
enemies.description: Confront hordes of terrifying enemies, from corrupted cultists to ancient demons. Each enemy type requires different tactics and strategies to defeat.

levels.heading: Explore Diverse Worlds
levels.description: Journey through varied environments, from desolate desert planets to the twisted corridors of hive cities. Each level presents unique challenges and secrets.

coffeeEngine.heading: Built with Coffee Engine
coffeeEngine.description: Developed exclusively with our proprietary Coffee Engine, this game showcases cutting-edge technology, optimized performance, and unlimited creative possibilities. Experience the future of gaming engines.

game.videoError: Your browser does not support the video tag.

enemies.title: ENEMIES
enemies.subtitle: Meet the forces that stand in your way
enemies.description: Face a variety of deadly enemies, each with unique abilities and combat strategies. From corrupted cultists to ancient demons, every encounter will test your skill as the last Space Marine.

challenge.heading: Ready for the Challenge?
challenge.description: Return to the main game and test your skills against these formidable enemies.

levels.title: LEVELS
levels.subtitle: Explore diverse battle environments
levels.description: Traverse varied and challenging environments, from arid desert plains to the industrial corridors of the Hive City. Each level presents unique challenges, secrets to discover, and strategically placed enemies.

mission.heading: Ready for the Mission?
mission.description: Return to the main game and explore these diverse environments.
